sentence.Network_en: Hmm, that is a lot, thought Little Nutbrown Hare.
sentence.Network_cn: 小兔子想:嗯, 这真的很多.

sentence.Network_en: Big Nutbrown settled Little Nutbrown Hare into his bed of leaves.
sentence.Network_cn: 大兔子轻轻的把小兔子放到叶子铺成的床上.

list.abs: then little nutbrown hare had a good idea ., 小兔子有了一个好主意.

entry.def: Nut-brown is used to describe things that are dark reddish brown in colour.

baesInfo.translate_result: outfrown以皱起眉头的愠怒表情使不再出声（或停止）
baesInfo.ciba_translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
baesInfo.translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
